messages.name: Copyedit
messages.description: Copyediting is about making a small fix to the way an article is written, and it is a valuable and easy way to get used to editing Wikipedia. Copyedits help articles be more professional and trustworthy.
messages.label: Copyedit (fix spelling, grammar, and tone)

messages.name: Find references
messages.description: Use books, websites, and news sources to validate that Wikipedia is accurate, and add those to articles so that readers can feel confident that what they're reading is true.
messages.shortdescription: Add sources to verify Wikipedia articles
messages.label: Find references (sources for existing articles)

messages.name: Update articles
messages.description: Articles get out of date as time goes on and new events occur. Find and add the correct information so that Wikipedia always contains the current truth.
messages.label: Update articles (bring existing articles up-to-date)

messages.name: Expand short articles
messages.description: Many Wikipedia articles are only a sentence or two long. Find more information and add it to make the article more complete.
messages.shortdescription: Make articles longer by finding and adding more information
messages.label: Expand short articles

messages.name: Add links between articles
messages.description:
Adding links is the easiest way to edit. Links allow readers to click on something they want to learn more about.
Links are suggested by machine, and you will decide whether to add them to the article.
messages.shortdescription: Make words from one article link to another article.
messages.label: Add links between articles

messages.name: Add an image to an unillustrated article
messages.description:
Suggestions are generated by machine. The images are from Wikimedia Commons, Wikipedia's collection of freely licensed images.
You will decide whether to add them to the article. You'll also write a caption for them.
messages.shortdescription: Decide whether an image from Wikimedia Commons should be added to the article.
messages.label: Add an image to an unillustrated article
